Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

char *

The basic type char * describes a normal zero-terminated C-style string.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_enumerate_3D_providers, AIL_enumerate_filters, AIL_find_3D_provider, AIL_find_filter, AIL_last_error, AIL_list_DLS, AIL_list_MIDI, AIL_set_redist_directory
Related Structures: VDI_HDR
